data.title: Warren Commission - Introduction
data.meta_description: Have a question about JFK Assassination Records? Ask it on HistoryHub! President Lyndon B. Johnson appointed the President's Commission on the Assassination of President Kennedy, commonly called the Warren Commission, by Executive Order (E.O. 11130) on November 29, 1963. Its purpose was to investigate the assassination of President John Fitzgerald Kennedy on November 22, 1963,
